USING THE DECISON TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS USED THE CORROSIVE RESPOSE SHEET TO CONTAIN THE SPILL FOR FURTHER PROCESSING IN THE DMP AREA. PRCOSSING THE SPILL USING THE WASTE DISPOSAL CHART AND THE CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEEETS WE PROCESSED THE SPILL.
